infrastructureAsCodeIssues.title: Azure Network Security Group allows public access
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.issue: Azure Network Security Group allows public access
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.impact: Public access to all resources behind the network security group
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.resolve: Set `source_address_prefix` attribute to specific IP range only, e.g. `192.168.1.0/24`

remediation.terraform: Set `source_address_prefix` attribute to specific IP range only, e.g. `192.168.1.0/24`
remediation.arm: Set `properties.sourceAddressPrefix` attribute to specific IP range only, e.g. `192.168.1.0/24`

iacDescription.issue: Azure Network Security Group allows public access
iacDescription.impact: Public access to all resources behind the network security group
iacDescription.resolve: Set `source_address_prefix` attribute to specific IP range only, e.g. `192.168.1.0/24`

infrastructureAsCodeIssues.title: Cognitive Search has insufficient replicas configured
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.issue: Cognitive Search has insufficient replicas configured
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.impact: An insufficient replicas configuration might impact the availability of Cognitive Search

infrastructureAsCodeIssues.title: Azure Search service public network access enabled
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.issue: Azure Search service public network access enabled
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.impact: Public access to Azure Search exposes the service to unnecessary risks

iacDescription.issue: Azure Search service public network access enabled

infrastructureAsCodeIssues.title: Azure Search Service is not using system-assigned identities
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.issue: Azure Search Service is not using system-assigned identities
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.impact: The risk of improperly configured authentication as well as missing credentials rotation increases if not using managed identities

iacDescription.issue: Azure Search Service is not using system-assigned identities
iacDescription.impact: The risk of improperly configured authentication as well as missing credentials rotation increases if not using managed identities

infrastructureAsCodeIssues.title: Trusted Microsoft Service access to storage account is disabled
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.issue: Network access bypass for Trusted Microsoft Services is not enabled on the storage account
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.impact: Trusted network services cannot be whitelisted via network rules. When any network rule is configured, the trusted services will not be able to access the storage account. Note, by default there is no network rule configured.
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.resolve: Set `network_rules.bypass` attribute to `['Azure Services']. Ensure to add appropriate rules for your application alongside the proposed remediation step. Setting this remediation without any other rules will block all network access to the storage account except for Microsoft Trusted Services.`

remediation.terraform: Set `network_rules.bypass` attribute to `['Azure Services']. Ensure to add appropriate rules for your application alongside the proposed remediation step. Setting this remediation without any other rules will block all network access to the storage account except for Microsoft Trusted Services.`
remediation.arm: Set `properties.networkAcls.bypass` attribute to `'Azure Services'. Ensure to add appropriate rules for your application alongside the proposed remediation step. Setting this remediation without any other rules will block all network access to the storage account except for Microsoft Trusted Services.`

iacDescription.issue: Network access bypass for Trusted Microsoft Services is not enabled on the storage account
iacDescription.impact: Trusted network services cannot be whitelisted via network rules. When any network rule is configured, the trusted services will not be able to access the storage account. Note, by default there is no network rule configured.
iacDescription.resolve: Set `network_rules.bypass` attribute to `['Azure Services']. Ensure to add appropriate rules for your application alongside the proposed remediation step. Setting this remediation without any other rules will block all network access to the storage account except for Microsoft Trusted Services.`
